altTitles.en: The Song that Transcends This World

description.en: During troubled times, Weng Shaoying is one of the most famous singers in Dongping. Many people go to Song of Fairyland just to see her perform. However, under her glamorous facade, she has been controlled for more than 10 years. On the other side of Dongping is Bi Xing Tang, one of the most famous gangs there. After her father’s death, Yanchu became the young female leader of Bi Xing Tang, which caused a lot of rumors to spread. On one inevitably fortuitous night, the two happened to meet. At that time, neither of them knew that they would eventually become the most important person in the other’s life. Starting from that night onwards, the gears in Shaoying and Yanchu’s fate will forever be rotating together.

altTitles.ja: 《魔力無限》のマナポーター ～パーティの魔力を全て供給していたのに、勇者に追放されました。魔力不足で聖剣が使えないと焦っても、メンバー全員が勇者を見限ったのでもう遅い～

description.en:
Thanks to his infinite mana, Ishua has been working as a mana porter to the hero party, doing a perfect task of supplying mana to the party members who consumed a lof of MP and earning the trust of his companions. However, Alan, the hero decides to banish him from the party in a fit of jealousy. 

"We don't need a mana porter!"

And chasing after Ishua through the forest Aria, the saint, appears wishing to continue adventuring with Ishua. The story of the banished strongest mana porter begins here!
description.ja: 生まれ持った無限の魔力で、マナポーターとして勇者パーティ全員の魔力供給を担ってきたイシュア。だが彼は、ある日突然、理不尽な理由でパーティを追放されてしまう。落胆するイシュアのもとに、彼を追ってきたパーティ仲間の聖女アリアの姿が。実は追放は勇者の独断で、彼女はイシュアが自分たちを見捨てたと思い、連れ戻しに来たのだった。真実を知ったアリアはパーティ脱退を決意し、イシュアは彼女と二人で旅を始めることになる。追放された最強マナポーターと、彼を追放した勇者。二人の対照的な冒険が今始まる!!

altTitles.ja: アツプル

description.en: The mysterious assassin, Apple, has been caught by President Bruno. Seemingly unarmed and tied to the ceiling, Apple must make use of some unorthodox methods to escape. Just what does Apple have up his sleeve and how does this tie to a magical spring called “God’s Fountain”?

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

description.ar:
أصبحت امرأة شريرة ماتت على يد زوجها في الرواية ، على وجه التحديد كشخصية داعمة تموت أثناء استخدامها كأداة للزواج السياسي من قبل والدها وشقيقها . وفي يوم من الأيام ، أحضر الأب أخيزا عريسها ... المشكلة أن الشخص الآخر هو الزوج الذي سيقتلني وأفضل فارس مقدس في الشمال الذي سيدمر الأسرة في المستقبل . أولا وقبل كل شيء ، يجب أن أجد طريقة للعيش . هناك العديد من الصعوبات مثل برودة الزوج ، وازدراء الدوق ، لكن يبدو أنه غير مؤذ للناس هنا . " لقد وقعت في حبك ! " لذا أرجوك أنقذني !

---

description.en:
In the original lines of the novel, I was a villainess—used as a political tool by my father and older brother—who ended up dying at the hands of my future husband.

To save his kingdom, my father desperately begged my fifth groom to take my hand in marriage. The problem is that the man I’m supposed to marry, the legendary knight of the North, is the same man who will end up murdering me and my entire family.

I have to find a way to survive.

Within the novel itself, there are many daunting challenges ahead of me: I have to find a way to save my husband’s little sister, win over my cold-hearted husband, and gain the support of the people of the North, all of whom currently despise me.

“I’m in love with you!”

So please, don’t kill me!

---
I thought I'd finally escaped my hellish life when I died in an airplane crash, but I fell into another nightmare when I awoke as Rudbeckia de Borgia, a minor villain from a historical novel destined to die at the hands of her husband, Iske van Omerta. Surviving with the dysfunctional Borgia family is hard enough, but now I have to marry the man who will kill me! Still, it’s okay, I just have to convince Iske, his family, and all his countrymen that I’m completely harmless! How hard can that be?

---

description.es:
Me convertí en Rudbekia, la villana dentro de una novela de fantasía que sería asesinada a manos de su marido. El maldito de mi padre, ya ha decidido con quien me volveré a casar a través de un matrimonio político. El principal problema, es que mi futuro esposo es quien me matara. Necesito encontrar una forma de sobrevivir. Si actuó inofensivamente ante la gente del Norte, si protejo a la hermana de mi marido, a quien maté en la historia original, y si finjo estar completamente enamorada de él, ¿tal vez me perdone la vida? —¡Me he enamorado de tí! ¡Así que por favor sálvame!

description.fa:
در قسمت های اصلی رمان، من یه فرد شرور بودم که توسط پدر و برادر بزرگترم به عنوان یه ابزار سیاسی استفاده میشدم و در نهایت به دست شوهر آیندم کشته شدم. پدرم برای نجات پادشاهی خودش به شدت به داماد پنجم التماس میکرد که با من ازدواج کنه. مشکل اینه که مردی که قراره باهاش ازدواج کنم، شوالیه افسانه ای شمال، همون مردیه که در نهایت من و تمام خانوادم رو میکشه. "باید راهی برای زنده موندن پیدا کنم." داخل خود رمان چالش های دلهره آور زیادی پیشه رو هس. من باید راهی برای نجات خواهر کوچک شوهرم پیدا کنم، بر ظاهر سرد شوهرم پیروز شم، حمایت مردم شمال رو به دست بیارم و دربرابر اتفاقات عجیب با موجودات عجیبی دووم بیارم که در حال حاضر همه اینا منو به یه فرد انتقام جو تبدیل میکنن. "عاشق توعم!" "پس لطفاً منو نکش!"

description.fr:
Dans le roman, elle est devenue une méchante qui est morte des mains de son mari. Pour être plus précis, elle est devenue un personnage secondaire qui est morte en étant utilisée comme un outil pour un mariage politique par son père et son frère. Un jour, mon satané père est sorti en rampant et a choisi mon cinquième marié. Le problème est que la personne choisie était le meilleur paladin du Nord et la personne même qui me tuera moi et ma famille dans le futur. D’abord, je dois trouver un moyen de vivre. Dans le roman, avant de trouver un moyen de sauver ma belle-sœur qui allait mourir de mes mains, il y a de nombreux défis que je dois surmonter. Par exemple, faire fondre l’extérieur froid de mon mari, gagner les faveurs des gens du Nord et surmonter le mépris du duc. Si je peux surmonter ces défis, ma vie ne sera-t-elle pas sauvée plus tard? «Je suis tombé amoureux de toi !» Alors s’il te plaît, épargne-moi!

---
Une jeune coréenne est réincarnée dans le corps de Rudbeckia de Borgia, la seule fille du pape. Cependant, Rudbeckia est destinée à mourir des mains de son époux après avoir été utilisée comme outil dans un mariage politique. Prenant les devants pour changer son destin, elle décide de gagner l'affection de Izek van Omerta du royaume de Britannia, paladin, neveu du roi et héritier du duché d'Omerta. Rudbeckia pourra-t-elle empêcher le meurtre de sa belle-sœur, assassinat qui lui avait coûté la vie? Et Izek, celui qui est supposé tuer Rudbeckia dans le futur, se rangera-t-il aux côtés de son épouse?

---

description.it:
Nelle righe originali del romanzo, ero una malvagia, usata come strumento politico da mio padre e mio fratello maggiore, che finì per morire per mano del mio futuro marito. Per salvare il suo regno, mio padre pregò disperatamente Isaac di Omerta di sposarmi. Il problema è che l'uomo che dovrei sposare, il leggendario cavaliere del Nord, è lo stesso uomo che finirà per uccidere me e tutta la mia famiglia. Devo trovare un modo per sopravvivere! All'interno del romanzo stesso, ci sono molte sfide scoraggianti: devo trovare un modo per salvare la sorellina di mio marito, conquistare il mio freddo marito e ottenere il sostegno della gente del Nord, che attualmente mi disprezza. "Sono innamorata di lei!" Riuscirò nell'impresa?

---
In un romanzo, è diventata una malvagia che è morta tra le mani di suo marito. Per la precisione, come "attrice" non protagonista, una cattiva che muore dopo essere stata utilizzata come strumento per un matrimonio strategico da suo padre e suo fratello. Un giorno, il mio dannato padre ha strisciato e ha offerto la mia mano al mio quinto sposo. Il problema è che lui è proprio il marito che mi ucciderà e il miglior paladino del nord che in futuro distruggerà la mia famiglia. Per prima cosa, devo trovare un modo per sopravvivere. Nel romanzo ci sono molte difficoltà, come il freddo disprezzo di mio marito, l'odio e il bisogno di controllo dei nordisti e il disprezzo dei contadini, prima di trovare un modo per salvarmi la vita, dovrò risolvere diversi problemi. "Sono innamorata di te!" Quindi, per favore, salvami!

---

description.ko:
판타지 소설 속 남편의 손에 죽는
악역 조연, ‘루드베키아’가 되었다.

이 세계의 망할 아버지는 내 정략결혼 상대를 또 물어왔다.
문제는 그 상대가 바로 날 죽이게 될 남편이라는 것!

일단은 살길을 찾아야 한다.

북부 사람들에게 최대한 무해하게 보이면서
원작에서 내가 죽일 남편의 여동생도 지키고,
남편에겐 사랑에 빠진 척하면 목숨은 살려주지 않을까?

“전 당신한테 반해버렸어요!”

그러니까 제발 살려줘!

description.pt:
Me tornei ‘Rudbeckia’, uma coadjuvante em uma história de fantasia, uma vilã que morre pelas mãos de seu marido. O pior pai do mundo me achou outro parceiro para um casamento político. O problema é, essa pessoa é o marido que vai me matar! Primeiro, preciso achar uma forma para viver. Preciso parecer o mais inofensiva possível para o povo do norte e proteger a irmãzinha do meu marido que matei na história original. Não seria capaz de salvar minha vida se fingisse estar apaixonada pelo meu marido?

“Me apaixonei por você à primeira vista!”

“Então, por favor, me poupe!”

description.ru:
Рудвекиа де Ворхиа является сикстинским ангелом и принцессой Романии, которой предначертано умереть от руки собственного мужа. После того как она стала обычным инструментом в руках верховного понтифика католической церкви и своего старшего брата, она вынуждена вступить в политический брак с лучшим паладином севера, который в будущем должен убить весь ее дом. Теперь девушка должна будет столкнуться с многочисленными трудностями, но ей придется приспособиться и выжить в новых условиях. Сначала ей придется доказать, что она не является опасностью для других людей, потому людям не стоит ее опасаться. Дальше же ей придется убедить всех людей в том, что она совершенно непричастна к делам понтифика и семьи.

description.tr:
Kocasının ellerinde ölen bir kötü kadın karakterin bedenine reenkarne oldum. Daha doğrusu, babası ve erkek kardeşi tarafından siyasi evlilik aracı olarak kullanılırken ölen bir yardımcı karakter oldum. Bir gün, lanet olası babam gitti ve beşinci kocamı seçti. Sorun şu ki, seçilen kişi Kuzey'in en iyi Paladin'i, dahası gelecekte beni ve ailemi öldürecek olan kişiydi. Önce yaşamanın bir yolunu bulmalıyım. Romanda benim ellerimde ölecek olan biricik kız kardeşini kurtarmanın bir yolunu bulmadan önce aşmam gereken birçok zorluk var. Kocamın soğuk yüzünü eritmek, Kuzeyli'nin beğenisini kazanmak ve Dük'ün küçümsemesini yenmek gibi. Bu zorlukların üstesinden gelebilirsem, hayatım sonunda kurtulmuş olmaz mı? "Sana aşık oldum!" Bu yüzden lütfen beni bağışla!

description.uk:
Вона стала злодійкою, яка померла від рук свого чоловіка в романі. Точніше, вона стала другорядною героїнею, яка померла, коли її батько і брат використовували як інструмент політичного шлюбу. По-перше, я маю знайти спосіб вижити у романі, знайти спосіб врятувати сестру мого чоловіка, яка в оригіналі померла від моїх рук, мені потрібно розтопити холодне серце мого чоловіка, завоювати прихильність населення та подолати презирство герцога. Якщо я зможу подолати ці труднощі, чи не буде моє життя врятовано пізніше? «Я закохався в тебе!» Тож будь ласка, пощади мене!

description.vi:
Trong cuốn tiểu thuyết gốc, tôi là một nhân vật phản diện - người được cha và anh trai sử dụng như một công cụ chính trị và cũng là người hết dưới tay chồng tương lai của mình. Để cứu vương quốc, cha tôi đã tuyệt vọng cầu xin chú rể nắm lấy tay tôi và kết hôn. Vấn đề là người đàn ông mà tôi phải kết hôn chính là hiệp sĩ huyền thoại của phương Bắc và cũng là người đàn ông sẽ tiêu diệt tôi và cả gia đình. Tôi phải tìm cách tồn tại. Trong cuốn tiểu thuyết, có rất nhiều thử thách khó khăn dc đặt ra cho tôi: tôi phải tìm cách cứu em gái của chồng mình, giành dc trái tim của người chồng lạnh lùng và có dc sự ủng hộ của người dân phương Bắc và tất cả những người hiện tại coi thường tôi. "Em yêu anh!" Vì vậy, xin anh đừng giết em!!

description.en:
I was reincarnated as a grimoire containing all the magical knowledge of another world.

Anyone who reads me can become a legendary archmage.

Please, just read me...
But no one is willing to open my pages.

description.en: Following an unfortunately timed case of the mumps, Hana Ichinose misses all of her high school entrance exams and ends up having to spend a gap year as a ronin. Moving to a new location and starting high school a year late, Hana becomes friends with her classmates, Eiko, Tama, and Kamuri, while keeping it a secret that she is a year older than them.

Kang Jihyoung,wanted to become a hunter for his mother.

However, his bullies put his mother into a vegetative state. He tried to take revenge but was thoroughly crushed and trapped...

The boy who lost everything became a beast and began his hunt.

Aspiring to become the student council president, Kokoro soon attracts the attention of some troublesome students with bad intentions. However, what they don't realize is that Kokoro Kasai is actually a psychopath.

La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en: "Genius Cool Treasure: The President's Wife Is Too Powerful" is a web comic serialized by a Japanese writer. The comic tells that five years ago, in a tent with black lights, the woman drove him drunk, and gave birth to twins and lost one. Five years later, the woman filmed him secretly, healed his hidden illness, stole his heart, and took a small bun to abduct his other son to play missing. Feng Yizhen swears that she must catch the woman's fierce affection and let her know that she has to pay the price.

description.en:
Isabelle is an orphan living in a temple with lots of knowledge about the love between men and women thanks to red covered novels that the saints had sneaked in.

But then, she found out that a priest secretly sold her to be a one-night stand for the duke who kills his lovers due to the shame of his inability to perform…

There’s only one way to get out of this, and it is to be a married woman.

At that moment, Isabelle recalled her childhood friend, Riggs, who said he wasn’t interested in dating.

“So, Riggs, marry me.”

“…What?”

“Nobles would refuse unless it’s a pure woman.”

“…Why do you hate the Duke of Cardiago so much?”

“Everything else is fine. Being a tyrant? If you’ve lived your life to the fullest, that could happen. But there can be no problems at night.”

Riggs was so frustrated that it seemed like he was going crazy.

A few days later, the reclusive Duke of Cardiago came to the temple.

Of course, the most surprising thing to Isabelle was the true identity of her childhood friend.

“Isabelle, you wanted to get married. You can’t say no because you proposed first. I’m the closest man to your ideal type anyway.”

“My ideal type?”

“Don’t I know your ideal type? You like guys who are tall, handsome, smell of soap at night, and sleep in simple clothes. Also, on the first night, the bed should break.”

“…”

“That’s everything, and I can do it all for you. So marry me.”

She once knew everything about her childhood friend, but that changed the moment they got married.

“Riggs, slow down…”

“I think I’m slow enough.”

“You weren’t always this impatient.”

Isabelle said pleadingly, but Riggs replied with a smirk.

“I was a childhood friend then, but now I’m your husband.”

---
Isabelle has always dreamed of meeting her true love and living happily ever after. Unfortunately, she discovers that she was just sold to the monstrous Duke Cardiego, who's infamous for killing his bride candidates. Her only way out is to quickly marry someone else, and as it turns out, her BFF, Lix, is the perfect choice! Although she tells him she will just stay a friend, Lix begins to show her that he doesn't feel the same way. Will their friendship be able to last through this matrimony?

Little had I known, I Chen Hansheng; the former elite of society and a Diamond Bachelor, was reborn. When I woke up, I was a senior graduate in high school? 
Later, Chen Hansheng was walking near the crosswalk, he seemed hesitant. A precious girl; Shen Youchu and two other girls; Bai Yueguang and Xiao Rongyu, who will he pick? All of them? One of them? Two of them? Read to find out. 

Side Note:  Diamond Bachelor is a slang word that means someone who’s insanely rich and single.

description.cs: Kdysi dávno byly dvě země, oddělené od sebe vysokou zdí. Země Uvnitř, kde žili lidé, a země Venku, obývaná prokletými bytostmi. Prokletí se šířilo dotykem – a tak každého, kdo vkročil do země Venku, čekal přísný trest. I přes to však v zemi Venku žila malá dívenka jménem Šiva. Nebyla sama – starala se o ni prokletá bytost, pan učitel. Ti dva se nesměli dotknout, avšak poutalo je k sobě více, než by se na první pohled mohlo zdát.
description.de: Die Welt ist geteilt in das Innere Land, in dem die Menschen leben und das Fremde Land, das von grotesken Wesen bewohnt wird. Berührt man sie, wird man verflucht. Doch als sich die Wege des kleinen Mädchens Shiva mit dem eines Monsters kreuzen, beginnt leise ihre herzerwärmende Geschichte…
description.en:
*It is a tale full of sorrow. From now let's recite a slow and beautiful story from long ago.*

Shiva, a young girl who loves to stroll about in the countryside, lives in an otherwise deserted village with her guardian, a wendigo-like gentleman known only as “Teacher.” He forbids her from going outside, so she won't be cursed, but Shiva's curiosity makes her yearn for more. What is really behind the mystery of the curse from the Outside?

---
In a world split between the Inside and the Outside, those living in both realms are told never to cross over to the other side, lest they be cursed. A young girl named Shiva lives on the other side, in a vacant village with a demonic guardian known only as "Teacher." Although the two are forbidden to touch, they seem to share a bond that transcends their disparate appearances. But when Shiva leaves Teacher’s care to seek out her grandmother, the secret behind her mysterious living arrangement comes to light.
description.es:
No debería haberla tocado. Pero una mano fría y negra, ajena a la del doctor, ha rozado la mejilla de Shiva. La frágil niña duda ante la posibilidad de haber sido maldita y convertirse en un ser exterior, mientras que el doctor no puede evitar sentirse horrorizado… En medio de una silenciosa confusión, el ser del exterior que ha tocado a la niña susurra una enigmática palabra: madre.

Esto es la mañana y la noche. Y entre el profundo abismo que los separa, una fábula de dos…

---
Hace mucho, mucho tiempo, en un lugar muy lejano había dos paí­ses. El país exterior en el que habitan uno seres anómalos que si te tocan te contagian una m aldición, y un país in­terior en el que habitan los humanos. Lo normal habría sido que nunca se hubieran conocido, pero su encuentro desencadenará a escondidas, una pe­queña historia.

Esto es la mañana y la noche.
description.fr: Il y a très longtemps, dans une contrée lointaine, existaient deux pays... «L'intérieur,» où vivaient les humains, et «l'extérieur,» où habitaient des créatures monstrueuses qu'il ne fallait surtout pas toucher, sous peine de subir la malédiction. Cette histoire commence le jour où se sont rencontrés deux êtres qui n'auraient jamais dû se croiser... Ils sont aussi différents que le jour et la nuit... Et malgré tout ce qui les sépare, malgré les ténèbres qui les entourent, ils vont écrire petit à petit une fable tous les deux...
description.it:
Questa è una triste e malinconica - eppure bellissima - storia di molto tempo fa.  
Shiva è una bambina che vive in un villaggio deserto assieme al suo guardiano, un gentiluomo dall'aspetto simile ad un Wendigo. Lui le proibisce di uscire, per timore che venga maledetta. Ma la piccola Shiva esidera esplorare il mondo oltre la sua piccola bolla protettiva…

---
Un tempo, in una terra molto lontana, vi erano due regni. In uno, "l'esterno", risiedevano creature dall'aspetto grottesco il cui tocco portava una maledizione. Nell'altro, "l'interno", c'era un rifugio sicuro per gli esseri umani. L'incontro fatidico tra due abitanti dei regni in guerra, che non avrebbero mai potuto incontrarsi, fa sbocciare la nostra piccola storia.
description.ja:
昔々、遠く遥けき地に二つの国ありて――。
触れると呪われるという異形の者棲まう『外』と、人間が住まう
『内』で分かたれた世界。
本来であれば、交わらぬはずのふたりが出会った時、
小さな物語が密やかに動き出す。

これは朝と夜――その深い断絶の宵に佇む、ふたりの御伽話……。
description.pl: W świecie podzielonym przez okrutną klątwę mała dziewczynka imieniem Siva została porzucona w lesie zamieszkałym przez przeklęte istoty. Przed niechybną śmiercią ratuje ją tajemniczy rogaty mistrz, który bierze dziecko w opiekę. Czy jednak długo będzie mógł chronić Sivę, jeśli nawet jego dotyk może zarazić dziewczynkę złym czarem?
description.pt: Em um país dividido entre pessoas normais e seres amaldiçoados, Shiva é uma menininha que foi acolhida por uma estranha criatura meio animal e meio humana. Sensei, como é chamado, não pode ser tocado e vive fora da cidade. Afastado do convívio com os demais e ciente dos perigos e maldições que os rodeiam, Sensei alerta Shiva para que ela não saia sozinha. Porém, quando a menininha decide reencontrar sua tia desaparecida, regras são quebradas — e a vida que eles conheciam é colocada em risco.
description.uk: Здавна світ було поділено на дві частини: Потойбіччя, де мешкали моторошні істоти - кожен, хто їх торкався, був проклятий; і Внутрішнє, де мешкали люди. Мешканці двох різних світів ніколи б не зустрілися, якби не випадок, який започаткував їхню таємну історію. Це казка про тих, що завмерли в передзахідних сутінках, що навіки розділили ранок і вечір.
description.vi:
"Nán lại buổi chạng vạng, chia cách ngày và đêm, là câu chuyện về họ". - Hãy cùng nhớ về miền kí ức xa xưa tuyệt đẹp, đong đầy hạnh phúc mà miên man nỗi buồn.
Shiva là cô bé luôn thích đi rong chơi mọi chốn xung quanh. Em sống nơi rìa rừng vắng vẻ cùng với Thầy - một người giám hộ có hình thù kì lạ. Thầy luôn cấm Shiva ra ngoài để không vận phải lời nguyền rủa, nhưng điều đó chẳng thể nào ngăn cản được sự tò mò của em. Sự bí ẩn đằng sau Vùng Ngoài là gì?
description.pt-br: Era uma vez uma criança e um não-humano maldito, vindos de dois mundos diferentes. A história de uma maldição. Shiva, uma jovem garota que adora passear pelo campo, vive em uma vila abandonada com seu guardião. Ele a proíbe de sair da vila para que ela não seja amaldiçoada, mas a curiosidade da Shiva a faz ansiar o mundo exterior. Sobre o que é essa maldição?
description.zh-hk:
從前，在遠方有兩個國家｜｜
世界被分成兩邊，一邊是據說有怪物棲息，只要一碰到怪物就會受到詛咒的「外」，另一邊是人類所居住的「內」。一個全身漆黑的怪物「老師」，與一個被拋棄的小女孩「汐華」，原本不會有機會相遇的兩個人相遇了。這時，小小的故事便悄悄地開始展開了。
這是深深將白天與夜晚分隔開來的｜｜
佇立在天黑之後的兩人之間的童話故事……

description.en:
“Even though I was supposed to have been rejected for marriage once…?!”
The Dragon Saintess, tasked with caring for the black dragon “Gramvint,” who protects the Kingdom of Elvasti, is the official fiancée of the kingdom’s prince. The current Dragon Saintess, “Ludia,” has dedicated her life since childhood to taking care of the enormous dragon that resides in a giant cage. She was also engaged to the prince, “Edik.”

However, one day, “Edik” suddenly summoned “Ludia” and informed her of her dismissal as the Dragon Saintess and the annulment of their engagement. To her shock, the new Dragon Saintess was her stepsister, “Leila.” What’s more, “Edik” told her that her next destination would be marriage to the Black General, “Wilfried.” But “Wilfried” rejected the marriage, saying, “You and I are not a good match”…?!

A certain town where rumors of the occult have suddenly been increasing.  
  
Sei, who lives in this town, encounters a strange girl. The girl wrongly thinks Sei is hitting on her and ends up tagging along with him. However, as it turns out, the strange girl is a certain legendary existence…

Alors allez lire "Akuyaku reijou no shitsuji sama drapeau hametsu wa ore ga tsubusasete itadakimasu" car ici n'est à lire que le concentré des chaps bonus pour les rares affamés, lecteurs de ces chapitres. Le spoil, c'est le mal. Alors gardez-vous si vous n'avez pas lu l'œuvre. (Comparer au reste des œuvres où l'on sort un chap par mois. Ici sera publié 1 chapitre tous les deux semaines) Bien à vous et bonne lecture

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

保健室では今日も秘密の恋が進行中!?

世話焼き学級委員長と、サボり魔の不良生徒。やさしい教育実習生と、一途な保健委員。真面目な生徒会長と、小悪魔な副会長。バスケ部のエースと、幼なじみのマネージャー。とある女子高の保健室を舞台に、全力で恋をする女の子たちを描いた、新感覚青春ラブストーリー開幕！

description.en:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
description.pt-br: Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Ele foi reencarnado como um aprendiz de 10 anos para um famoso farmacêutico da Royal Court, tinha alcançado habilidades desumanas de habilidade para ver a doença, a criação material e a destruição material. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez. A popular web novel agora vem em forma de manga!

altTitles.ja: 幸色のワンルーム

altTitles.es: Una habitación del color de la felicidad

altTitles.th: หนึ่งห้องแห่งความสุข

description.cs:
Jednoho dne dojde k únosu mladé dívky.
Pro ni je to ale nový začátek, poprvé začne doufat ve šťastný život. Ona mu slíbí, že si ho vezme. On se jí za to snaží do života vnést co nejvíc šťastných chvil.
Jedná se o únosce a jeho oběť… Tak proč k sobě mají tak blízko?
description.de: Sachi kommt mit ihren Eltern nicht klar und will einfach nur weg. Deshalb täuscht sie gemeinsam mit dem Typen, der sie immer stalkt, eine Entführung vor. Versteckt in dessen Einzimmer-Appartment machen die beiden einen Deal: Wenn sie mit der Entführungsnummer durchkommen, wird geheiratet...
description.en:
One day, a fourteen year-old girl was kidnapped… or so the police have been lead to believe. Actually, she tried to run away from her abusive parents and was helped by her stalker who then shelters her in his apartment. Although he considers his actions as kidnapping, the girl is happy about the situation and proposes to him, with the condition that if they are caught, they will commit suicide.

---
One day, a girl was kidnapped. However, that girl started to desire a life living with her captor, and swears that she will marry him. In return, her captor provides her with happiness that she had always longed for. How could a story between a girl and her captor be so heart warming?
description.es: Tras ser secuestrada, una chica desgraciada es feliz por primera vez. El día que la secuestran empieza una vida con un hilo de esperanza. Ella le promete a su secuestrador que se casarán y él le ofrece felicidad. ¿Cómo pueden tener una relación tan cálida siendo un secuestrador y su víctima?
description.id:
"Kalau berhasil lolos, kita akan menikah. Kalau tertangkap, kita mati bersama..."

Begitulah janji yang dilontarkan Sachi pada pemuda yang baru saja menculiknya. Dia yang tak punya tempat di manapun di dunia ini, merasa menemukan kebahagiaan di sisi penculiknya...
description.it:
Un giorno una ragazza di quattordici anni viene rapita. O almeno è quello che la polizia crede. In realtà la ragazza ha provato a fuggire dai violenti genitori e ha trovato rifugio… dal suo stalker, che ora la ospita nel suo appartamento.

Per quanto lui continui a pensare di aver commesso un rapimento, la ragazza è felice di quello che è successo e si dichiara a lui, promettendo che, in caso di cattura, si toglieranno la vita insieme.
description.ja:
薄幸な少女は誘拐されて“幸せ"を初めて知る。

その日、少女は誘拐された。
しかし、それは少女にとって一縷の希望にかけた生活の始まりだった。
少女は誘拐犯に結婚を誓い、誘拐犯は少女にたくさんの“幸せ"を捧ぐ。
被害者と誘拐犯の関係なのに―――どうしてこんなに温かいの?
pixiv&Twitterの超話題作が待望の書籍化!!!
半分以上が本書限定の描き下ろしエピソードを収録!!!
description.pl: W mediach zawrzało. Wieść o zaginionej nastolatce rozniosła się w mgnieniu oka. Policja nie wyklucza porwania. Nikt nie przypuszcza, że płaczący przed kamerą rodzice, od lat znęcali się nad córką. Nie mogąc dłużej tego znieść dziewczyna uciekła z domu i znalazła schronienie pod dachem tajemniczego młodego mężczyzny. Ściany pokoju, w którym teraz mieszka zdobi mozaika zdjęć zrobionych jej z ukrycia. Wybawcą nastolatki jest bowiem jej własny stalker. Choć dziewczyna przebywa z nim dobrowolnie i może odejść w każdej chwili, obydwoje zdają sobie sprawę, że jeśli ktoś pozna ich sekret, mężczyzna natychmiast zostanie skazany za porwanie. Nastolatka proponuje więc swojemu wybawcy niezwykły układ - jeśli zdołają ukryć się do czasu, gdy uzyska pełnoletniość, wezmą ślub. Jeśli złapie ich policja - obydwoje popełnią samobójstwo. Jaki będzie finał tej dramatycznej historii?
description.vi: Một cô gái 14 tuổi bị bắt cóc, nhưng lạ thay, cô không hề kháng cự, tthay vào đó, cô hứa sẽ kết hôn với chính kẻ đã bắt cóc mình, đổi lại anh phải che trở cho cô, đem lại hạnh phúc cho cô - thứ cô chưa từng được biết đến suốt 14 năm xuân xanh của mình. Một câu chuyện cảm động nói về 2 con người- 2 số phận bi đát tìm được nhau, liệu họ có trốn thoát khỏi những kẻ đang săn đuổi mình, liệu hạnh phúc có đến với 2 số phận bi đát kia không...? Chúng ta hãy chờ xem.

title.en: The Demon King Who Lost His Job

altTitles.pt-br: O rei demônio que perdeu o emprego

description.en: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.
description.pt-br: Ele é o Rei Demônio que sofreu impeachment. Ela é a corajosa heroína que foi demitida por causa de uma expedição fracassada. Presos pelo destino, os dois embarcam em uma aventura para pagar suas dívidas.

altTitles.ja: さつきコンプレックス

description.en:
Satsuki looks totally like a girl… but is actually a boy?!  
This story is about Satsuki, his little brother Kouta, and friends.  
Full of embarassing but funny moments.

title.en: Fuguushoku to Baka ni Saremashita ga, Jissai wa Sorehodo Waruku Arimasen?

altTitles.ru: Все смеялись надо мной из-за отсутствия профессии, но всё не так уж и плохо

altTitles.ja: 不遇職とバカにされましたが、実際はそれほど悪くありません？

altTitles.en: They ridiculed me for my luckless job, but it's not actually that bad?

altTitles.vi: Mọi Người Cười Nhạo Chức Nghiệp Vô Năng Của Tôi Nhưng Nó Không Tệ Đến Thế

description.en:
Shirosaki Reito was suddenly sucked in by a mysterious crack and got transferred in between dimensions. He got reincarnated as a baby in another world. He was born in the royal family and was the heir to the throne but he was driven/kicked of the palace. The reason was that he was born as a Support magician and had Alchemist as a job which was the lowest job that existed in the new world and people who had that were considered jobless. But there was a secret hidden in that job!!   
From jobless to the strongest job!!!  



---

  
Bookwalker LN:  
<https://bookwalker.jp/series/182424/>  
Official LN:  
<https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/312278148/185185579>
description.fr:
Shirosaki Reito a été soudainement aspiré par une mystérieuse fissure et a été transféré entre deux dimensions.  
Il s'est réincarné en bébé dans un autre monde.  
Né dans la famille royale et étant l'héritier du trône, il est cependant chassé du palais.  
La raison ?  
être né en tant que magicien de soutien et avoir une profession d'alchimiste !  
Considérée comme la profession la plus faible, Reito fera tout pour s'endurcir et devenir fort !
description.ru: Широсаки Рейто неожиданно засосало в загадочную расщелину и переместило в измерение между мирами, после чего он переродился младенцем в ином мире. Он появился на свет в королевской семье, оказавшись наследником трона, но всё равно в итоге его выгнали из дворца. Причиной этому послужило то, что он оказался магом поддержки и заполучил профессию алхимика, оказавшуюся слабейшей в этом новом мире. Таких как он в этом фантастическом мире магии считают не имеющими профессии, но, как оказалось, существует некий секрет!! Проследим же путь становления сильнейшим в мире героя со слабейшей профессией!

title.en: Dropout kara no Sai Shuushoku-saki wa, Isekai no Saikyou Kishidan deshita

altTitles.ja: ドロップアウトからの再就職先は、異世界の最強騎士団でした

altTitles.en: After the Dropout, My Re-Employment Office is the Strongest Order of Knights in the Another World

description.en: Violinist Masumi Todo gave up her professional career after failing in an international competition. Despite her disappointment, she is unable to give up the violin, but one day she suddenly falls down a flight of stairs and is lost in another world. In the midst of the confusion, she is accused of espionage and taken to a place where she is forced to explain herself to the Knight Commander Arc. In a situation of absolute desperation, Masumi's destiny is illuminated by a "violin" that has come to the other world with her.
description.ja: プロのヴァイオリニストを目指す藤堂真澄は、国際コンクールでの失敗を機に夢を諦めていた。失意の中でも、ヴァイオリンだけは手放せずにいたがある日階段から転落すると異世界に迷い込み……混乱収まらぬまま、スパイ容疑で拘束されてしまう。騎士団長アークを前に弁明を迫られる絶体絶命の状況下、真澄の運命に救いの手を差し伸べたのは――。共に異世界にやってきた"ヴァイオリン"だった。

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Dou ka Ore wo Houtte Oitekure - Naze ka Bocchi no Owatta Koukou Seikatsu wo Kanojo ga Kaeyou to shite kuru

altTitles.ja: どうか俺を放っておいてくれ なぜかぼっちの終わった高校生活を彼女が変えようとしてくる

altTitles.en: Please Leave Me Alone: For Some Reason, She Wants to Change a Lone Wolf's Helpless High School Life

description.en:
Love, friendship, and the sparkling joys of youth. The high school life that I’ve looked forward to—still ended with me being alone. Then, just a day before the graduation ceremony...

*“Don’t die! Nanamura-kun!”*

Sora Hanamitsuji, she’s a beautiful girl that even models can’t compare to. My life ended after getting hit by a truck to protect her. That should’ve been the case.

However, with this accident, Hanamitsuji-san and I returned to the day of our high school’s entrance ceremony. The second high school life is no longer as charming and youthful. I was going to spend it modestly and alone. But, she said that won’t do.

*“Well, I’ll help you make friends.”*

This is a story about my second high school life. It’s the worst and best teenage rom-com ever.
description.ja: 恋、友情、輝かしい青春。そんな期待に胸を膨らませた俺の高校生活は――結局ぼっちのまま終わった。そして迎えた卒業式前日。クラスメイトの花見辻空をかばい、俺はトラックに轢かれて人生の幕を閉じた……はずだった。花見辻と一緒に高校一年生の入学式に戻ってしまった俺。二度目の高校生活は輝かしい青春など期待せず大人しくぼっちで過ごそうと思いきや……。「ぼっち脱却、私が手伝ってあげる」この物語は俺が二度目の高校生活で送る、最悪で最高の青春ラブコメだ。GA文庫の大人気作、待望のコミカライズ!

title.en: The Duchess Goes Crazy Once A Day

altTitles.en: I Was Possessed by the Mad Lady's Body That I Served
An Abused Maid Takes Revenge by Switching Bodies with a Sickly Daughter

description.en: Maid Bella endured long-term bullying in the Duke's house. After being tortured to death, her soul traveled through time and space to become the mad lady. She married the monstrous count and began to take revenge with a new identity.
100 Short Manga about Types of and Behavior in Yuri Relationships

altTitles.ja: 天より高く

description.en: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

altTitles.en: I Made a Contract With Myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

altTitles.es: La Chica Malvada Se Convierte En Emperatriz

description.en:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

Alternative Raws: [Kuaikan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc27719)

altTitles.ja: レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻？！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我成了反派大佬的小嬌妻？！

altTitles.ja: 私は悪役の甘えん坊妻になりました

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Cheng Le Fan Pai Da Lao De Xiao Jiao Qi?!

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

altTitles.ja: 男たち

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Shinichi, who has been transferred to Tokyo for work, asks his uncle, who lives in downtown Tokyo, for a place to live and visits an apartment named "Eastern". 

However, it turns out to be a devil's cave with many residents who have their own peculiarities! His uncle, nicknamed "Dharma," is the head of the apartment. What is the fate of Shinichi, who has been in deep trouble since the first day he moved in? 

A visceral work by the master storyteller, Tetsuya Chiba!

title.en: Henkyou Mob Kizoku no Uchi ni Totsuidekita Akuyaku Reijou ga, Mechakucha Dekiru Yoi Yome Nanda ga?

altTitles.ja: 辺境モブ貴族のウチに嫁いできた悪役令嬢が、めちゃくちゃできる良い嫁なんだが？

altTitles.ja-ro: Henkyo Mob Kizoku no Uchi ni Totsuidekita Akuyaku Reijo ga, Mechakucha Dekiru Yoi Yome nanda ga?

altTitles.en: The Villainess Who Came to Marry Into the Frontier Noble's Household is an Exceptionally Capable Wife, Isn't She?
The Villainess Who Was Dumped Got Married into My Family, a Mob Noble from the Frontier, and Turns Out, She's an Amazing Capable Wife?

altTitles.vi: Tôi, một quý tộc ở biên giới đã kết hôn với nữ phản diện có năng lực tuyệt vời

altTitles.pt-br: A Vilã que Veio se Casar com a Família Nobre da Fronteira é uma Esposa Excepcionalmente Capaz, Não é?

altTitles.id: Villainess yang Menikah dengan Seorang NPC Bangsawan Perbatasan

description.en:
Ragna, the heir to a frontier noble family, is a reincarnated former Japanese citizen who realizes that the world he now lives in is the setting of an otome game. Dreaming of a carefree life as an adventurer, his plans are derailed when a war takes his family, forcing him to take on the responsibilities of managing his family’s lands. 

Struggling with the unfamiliar duties of a lord, his already chaotic life takes another turn when an unexpected engagement to a noblewoman from a higher-ranking family is arranged.

To his surprise, the bride-to-be is Alicia, the "villainess" of the otome game’s story — a character destined for heartbreak, a demonic pact, and ultimate destruction. Now sharing his life with someone fated for tragedy, Ragna is swept up in the wheels of fate. 

Can he rewrite the predetermined outcomes of this world and secure a peaceful life for himself and Alicia?
description.id:
Ragna, penerus dari keluarga bangsawan perbatasan, dulunya adalah seorang penduduk jepang yang telah bereinkarnasi, kemudian dia menyadari bahwa dunia yang ditinggalinya sekarang adalah dunia game otome.

Dia yang seharusnya bercita-cita untuk hidup bebas menjadi petualang, seketika hancur ketika keluarganya gugur dalam perang, yang kemudian memaksa dirinya untuk menjadi penerus wilayahnya dan melakukan tugas-tugas untuk mengatur wilayah keluarganya.

Kesulitan dengan tugas-tugas baru yang harus dilakukan olehnya, kehidupannya yang sibuk secara tiba-tiba kedatangan seorang gadis bangsawan dengan status yang lebih tinggi darinya karena adanya sebuah lamaran pernikahan yang dipaksakan kepadanya, dan betapa terkejutnya dia setelah mengetahui bahwa calon istrinya adalah seorang "villainess" dari game otome yang pernah dimainkan olehnya, yaitu alicia.

Alicia adalah sebuah karakter yang ditakdirkan untuk sakit hati, bersekutu dengan iblis, dan menemui kehancuran. 

Karena sekarang ragna diharuskan untuk berbagi kehidupannya dengan seseorang yang ditakdirkan mengalami nasib buruk membuat ragna juga ikut terseret kedalamnya, jadi bisakah dia mengubah takdir dunia ini, dan hidup berdua dengan tenang bersama alicia?
description.ja:
辺境貴族の跡取りであるラグナは、元日本人の転生者で、この世界は彼の知る乙女ゲー世界だった。
気ままにのんびり暮らしたいのに、慣れない領地運営に翻弄される日々。
そんななか、突然、ラグナと格上貴族との婚姻が決まってしまう。
そうして嫁いできた公爵令嬢・アリシアは、なんと乙女ゲーの「悪役令嬢」で――!?
description.vi:
Ragna, người thừa kế của một gia đình quý tộc ở biên giới, là một công dân Nhật Bản kiếp trước đã được đầu thai vào thế giới mới và nhận ra rằng nơi anh đang sống chính là bối cảnh của một trò chơi otome.

Mơ ước về một cuộc sống tự do như một mạo hiểm giả, kế hoạch của anh bị xáo trộn khi một cuộc chiến tranh cướp đi gia đình anh, buộc anh phải gánh vác trách nhiệm quản lý lãnh thổ của gia tộc. Khi đang vật lộn với những nghĩa vụ xa lạ của một lãnh chúa, cuộc sống vốn đã hỗn loạn của anh lại thêm một biến cố nữa khi một cuộc hôn nhân bất ngờ với một quý nữ từ gia tộc công tước được sắp đặt. Ngạc nhiên thay, cô dâu tương lai của anh là Alicia, nhân vật "ác nữ" trong câu chuyện của trò chơi otome — một nhân vật số phận đã được định sẵn sẽ gặp phải đau khổ, ký khế ước với ác quỷ và sau cùng là chết thảm.

Giờ đây, khi phải chia sẻ cuộc sống với người đã được số phận an bài cho bi kịch, Ragna bị cuốn vào bánh xe số phận đầy trớ trêu Liệu anh có thể viết lại những kết quả đã được định sẵn của thế giới này và mang lại một cuộc sống yên bình cho bản thân và Alicia?
description.pt-br:
Ragna, o herdeiro de uma família nobre das fronteiras, é um ex-cidadão japonês reencarnado que se dá conta de que o mundo em que vive agora é o cenário de um jogo otome. Sonhando com uma vida tranquila como aventureiro, seus planos são frustrados quando uma guerra tira sua família, forçando-o a assumir as responsabilidades de administrar as terras da família.

Lutando com as tarefas desconhecidas de ser um lorde, sua vida já caótica dá outra guinada quando um noivado inesperado com uma nobre de uma família de ranking superior é arranjado.

Para sua surpresa, a noiva é Alicia, a "vilã" da história do jogo otome — uma personagem destinada ao desgosto, a um pacto demoníaco e à destruição final. Agora, compartilhando sua vida com alguém fadado à tragédia, Ragna é arrastado pelas engrenagens do destino.

Será que ele consegue reescrever os desfechos predeterminados desse mundo e garantir uma vida pacífica para si e para Alicia?

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou desu ga, Moto Geboku no Juujin ni Flag Kaishuu Saretemasu!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou desu ga, Moto Geboku no Juujin ni Flag Kaishuu Saretemasu!?

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢ですが、元下僕の獣人にフラグ回収されてます!?

altTitles.en: I'm a Villain Daughter, but the Flag Has Been Collected by My Ex-Servant Beastman

description.en:
Anieska was once a member of a count's family called the "villainous daughter" because of her behavior. She instructed the beastman she had picked up to attack the fiancée of the prince she fell in love with but was betrayed and ultimately lost. After that, she changed her name to Anika and moved to live in a remote village.

One day, the lord summons her so he can welcome her as his wife. However, that lord was Ray, the beastman who once betrayed her. Anika, who was taken to Ray's mansion, who was once treated as a slave, decides to get rid of her long-standing grudge...

When Kaya runs into trouble one day, it’s not a knight in shining armor, but her stuffed animals that come to her rescue. It may sound crazy, but Kaya isn’t pretending: she loves her stuffed animals so much, they come to life and turn into people! Stuffed animals come in all different shapes and sizes, and so do their hearts—whereas some are nice, there are others who are not so kind.

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

---

description.id:
Pekerjaan apa yang akan kau pilih untuk bertahan hidup saat dunia hancur oleh monster-monster yang tiba-tiba bermunculan?! Setelah memilih 'Necromancer' sebagai pekerjaannnya, Sungwoo dapat menjadikan monster yang telah ia kalahkan menjadi pengikutnya!

---

description.ko:
곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?
"네크로맨서"

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

---

description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

description.zh:
魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

title.en: Nee, Mou Isso Tsukiacchau? Osananajimi no Bishoujo ni Tanomarete, Camo Kareshi Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: ねぇ、もういっそつき合っちゃう？幼馴染の美少女に頼まれて、カモフラ彼氏はじめました

altTitles.en: Hey, Wanna Go Out with Me? My Childhood Friend, a Beautiful Girl, Asked for My Help, and Now I've Become Her Camouflage Boyfriend.

altTitles.zh-hk: 吶，要不我們交往吧？被美少女青梅竹馬拜託，開始假冒她的男友

description.en:
Masaichi Mazono, an otaku boy, and Toiro Kurumi, the most beautiful girl in school, are childhood friends. Toiro, who was always in Masaichi's room, was supposed to be like family to him. But one day, Toiro, who was constantly getting annoyed by her romantic troubles, asks Masaichi to play the role of her boyfriend. They thought it would be simple to pretend to be a couple because they’d been together for so long, but their ideal childhood friend can't possibly end up as a false lover...

_"E-eh no, holding hands is embarrassing."_

A childhood friend who is more than a lover embarks on a more adventurous lover's life than she could have dreamed!
description.ja: オタク男子・真園正市と、学校一の美少女・来海十色は腐れ縁の幼馴染。ある日、恋愛関係のトラブルに嫌気がさした十色に頼まれ、正市は彼氏役を演じることに。「元々ずっと一緒にいるから、カップルのフリも簡単！」と思っていた二人だが、相性抜群の幼馴染が偽の恋人で終わるはずがなく――!?

altTitles.ja: 戦闘員、派遣します！

altTitles.vi: Chiến binh sẽ được phái đi!

description.en: The Secret Society Kisaragi has one mission: world domination! They claim to be an evil organization, but their scientist is eccentric, their hot female generals wear little clothing, and they’re surprisingly concerned about the fate of the world?! No. 6 is a Combatant for Kisaragi, meaning his body has been reconstructed to be stronger and obey the orders of the generals. His latest mission? To do recon on an unknown alien planet with his new partner, the deadpan android Alice. There, he meets a busty female knight… riding a unicorn?! Thus begins their hilarious invasion of a magical fantasy world!
description.es: La Sociedad Secreta Kisaragi tiene una misión: dominación mundial. Afirman que es una organización malvada, pero su científica es excéntrica, sus ardientes generales mujeres usan poca ropa y están sorprendentemente preocupados por el destino del mundo. No. 6 es un Combatiente para Kisaragi, lo que significa que su cuerpo ha sido reconstruido para ser más fuerte y obedecer las órdenes de los generales. ¿Su última misión? Hacer reconocimiento en un planeta alienígena desconocido con su nueva pareja, la inexpresiva androide Alicia. Allí, conocí a una caballero tetona…¡¿montando un unicornio?! ¡Así comienza su hilarante invasión de un mundo mágico de fantasía!
description.pt: Havia uma empresa chamada Kisaragi, uma sociedade secreta do mal que derruba um número de heróis no mundo e está prestes a conquistar o muno. Como não se sabe os desejos dessa associação, o combatente N° 6, o protagonista, será despachado para outros planetas com a android Alice. No entanto, este combatente mudou as configurações da android pare que ela não se comportasse como se fosse uma invasão, e sim u festival de Ochin, fazendo seus companheiros ficarem estúpidos. Além disso, quando chamaram novos companheiros, os novos membros que se uniram atraíram estandarismo, como a estupida quimera e o bispo. Enquanto isso, o mesmo vendedor que invoca o exército Magus começa a invadir a terra para destruí-la. A notícia se espalha nas ruas por atos de contravenção, e é transmitida ao herói que estava carregando a virtude do mal. “Não há organizações más no mundo” combatente N° 6 finalmente entra em ação com as heroínas metamorfose e as táticas de Kudzu, invadindo o novo mundo.
description.ru: Протагонистом является старший элитный боец корпорации зла именуемой как "Тайное сообщество Кисараги", которого вместе с девочкой андроидом отправили в другое измерение. И так они оказываются в мире меча и магии, где им предстоит создать предпосылки для захвата этого нового мира корпорацией зла Кисараги.
description.pt-br: A Sociedade Secreta Kisaragi tem uma missão: dominar o mundo! Eles afirmam ser uma organização maligna, mas seu cientista é excêntrico, suas generais gostosas usam pouca roupa e estão surpreendentemente preocupadas com o destino do mundo?! O nº 6 é um combatente de Kisaragi, o que significa que seu corpo foi reconstruído para ser mais forte e obedecer às ordens dos generais. Sua última missão? Para fazer reconhecimento em um planeta alienígena desconhecido com sua nova parceira, a andróide inexpressiva Alice. Lá, ele conhece uma cavaleira peituda… montando um unicórnio?! Assim começa a hilariante invasão de um mundo mágico de fantasia!
